articles.title: EU sues AstraZeneca over delayed deliveries - RTE.ie
articles.description: The European Commission has said it has launched legal action against AstraZeneca for not respecting its contract for the supply of Covid-19 vaccines and for not having a "reliable" plan to ensure timely deliveries.
